name: The Inevitable Snowman
description:
Delay the inevitable! — Your snowman is melting in the antarctic sun, and a swarm of flaming felines is arriving to quicken its demise. Collect snowballs and throw them at the snowman in order to keep it looking frosty in this action-arcade game!

Features:

  • Collapsible ice platforms that sink as you cross them and melt as fire-cats get near
  • Collectable snowballs that you can throw at the snowman to replenish it or throw at fire-cats to defeat them
  • Two types of fire-cats that try to ruin your day by throwing fireballs at your snowman and melting the ice platforms
  • Difficulty progression - keep your snowman alive for as long as possible to get to the top of the leaderboards
  • Collectable hats!

Controls M/K:

  • WASD to move.
  • SPACE to jump.
  • MOUSE 1 to shoot/throw snowballs.

Controls GamePad:

  • LEFT THUMBSTICK to move.
  • RIGHT THUMBSTICK to aim.
  • L1/R1/A to jump.
  • L2/R2 to shoot/throw snowballs.
